DateTime::Locale::uz_AF(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DateTime::Locale::uz_AF(3)

NAME

DateTime::Locale::uz_AF

SYNOPSIS

  use DateTime;

  my $dt = DateTime->now( locale => 'uz_AF' );
  print $dt->month_name();

DESCRIPTION

This is the DateTime locale package for Uzbek Afghanistan.

DATA

This locale inherits from the DateTime::Locale::uz_Arab_AF locale.

It contains the following data.

Days

Wide (format) 

  XXXXXX
  XXXXXXX
  XXXXXXXX
  XXXXXXX
  XXXX
  XXXX
  XXXXXX

  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.

Narrow (format)

  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.

Wide (stand-alone)

  XXXXXX
  XXXXXXX
  XXXXXXXX
  XXXXXXX
  XXXX
  XXXX
  XXXXXX

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.
  X.

Narrow (stand-alone)

  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X

Quarters

Wide (format) 

  Q1
  Q2
  Q3
  Q4

Abbreviated (format)

  Q1
  Q2
  Q3
  Q4

Narrow (format)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Wide (stand-alone)

  Q1
  Q2
  Q3
  Q4

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  Q1
  Q2
  Q3
  Q4

Narrow (stand-alone)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Eras

Wide 

  BCE
  CE

Abbreviated

  X.X.
  X.

Narrow

  X.X.
  X.

Date Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 XXX XXX 5 XXX XXXXXX XXXXXXX XXXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 XXX XXX 22 XXX XXXXX XXXX XXXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 XXX XXX 15 XXX XXXXXX XXXX XXXX

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX XXXXXX 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX XXXXX 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX XXXXXX -10

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX -10

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/9/15

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX -10

Time Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 (UTC)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 (UTC)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 (UTC)

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 (UTC)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 (UTC)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 (UTC)

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

Datetime Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 XXX XXX 5 XXX XXXXXX XXXXXXX XXXX 18:30:30 (UTC)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 XXX XXX 22 XXX XXXXX XXXX XXXX 9:05:02 (UTC)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 XXX XXX 15 XXX XXXXXX XXXX XXXX 4:44:23 (UTC)

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX XXXXXX 2008 18:30:30 (UTC)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX XXXXX 1995 9:05:02 (UTC)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX XXXXXX -10 4:44:23 (UTC)

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX 2008 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX 1995 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX -10 4:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2/5 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22 9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/9/15 4:44

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX 2008 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX 1995 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX -10 4:44:23

Available Formats

d (d) 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15

EEEd (d EEE)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 X.
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 X.
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 X.

Hm (H:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44

hm (h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM

Hms (H:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

hms (h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM

M (L)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9

Md (M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/15

MEd (E, M-d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = X., 2-5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = X., 12-22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = X., 9-15

MMM (LLL)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XXX

MMMd (MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XXX 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XXX 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XXX 15

MMMEd (E MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = X. XXX 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = X. XXX 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = X. XXX 15

MMMMd (d XXX MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 XXX XXXXXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 XXX XXXXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 XXX XXXXXX

MMMMEd (E MMMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = X. XXXXXX 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = X. XXXXX 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = X. XXXXXX 15

ms (mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 44:23

y (y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10

yM (y-M)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008-2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995-12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10-9

yMEd (EEE, y-M-d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = X., 2008-2-5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = X., 1995-12-22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = X., -10-9-15

yMMM (y MMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 XXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 XXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 XXX

yMMMEd (EEE, y MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = X., 2008 XXX 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = X., 1995 XXX 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = X., -10 XXX 15

yMMMM (y MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 XXXXXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 XXXXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 XXXXXX

yQ (y Q)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 1
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 4
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 3

yQQQ (y QQQ)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 Q1
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 Q4
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 Q3

yyQ (Q yy)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 1 08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 4 95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 3 -10

yyyyM (yyyy/M)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/9

yyyyMMMM (MMMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XXXXXX 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XXXXX 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XXXXXX -10
